Equipped creature gets +1/+2.
When equipped creature dies, you may sacrifice this artifact. If you do, return that creature card to its owner's hand.
Equip {2}
Conceive 3–{6} [i]({6}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a 3/3 colorless Elemental creature token, then create a token that's a copy of this card attached to it. Conceive only as a sorcery.)[/i]
